alert.note: Alert for Leon; Robertson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 23 at 1:54PM CST until January 25 at 1:30PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Navasota River Near Easterly affecting Leon and Robertson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING TO EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Navasota River near Easterly. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening to early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding will occur from below Easterly to below Highway 21. Cattle in the flood plain could be affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 13.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 18.9 feet tomorrow morning. It will rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening to 19.1 feet early Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday morning. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
